issue.title: [CF 615] Very low framelevels causing issues
issue.body:
Perhaps you should place a restriction on very low framelevels (below 5 or something). When I set a group to level 1 the cooldownsweep goes missing and borderanimations begin strangely interfering with the icons.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #615 | Raw
